function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Rapid expansion of new health clubs without thorough planning may lead to overcrowding and inadequate sanitation measures.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inclusive design for a diversified range of activities can lead to challenges in maintaining hygiene and preventing disease transmission across different areas of the health club facilities.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of focus on pandemic risks in health club facilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate focus on cleanliness and maintenance","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for accessibility and safety for physically challenged individuals","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of assessment of precautionary measures at sports club facilities during pandemics","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Voluntary implementation of sports facility policies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of systematic procedure for developing precautionary measures for COVID-19 in sports facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of utilization of post-occupancy evaluation POE for proposed sports club designs","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect in implementing healthy and safety practices at sports facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for COVID-19 precautionary requirements","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate maintenance, hygiene practices, and cleanliness of spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing and interaction promotion in fitness center design","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and confinement of indoor spaces leading to efficient spread of COVID-19 particles in buildings.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of focus on POE studies in the context of management of health club facilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Control measures limiting sports activities and services based on COVID-19 risk levels","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Importance of recording operation, protection measures, signages, and briefings for managing pandemic risks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of unified guidelines for sports facilities and practices","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate enforcement of social distancing regulations in sports facilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient disinfection and monitoring of swimming pool facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sharing equipment or space increases the potential risk of COVID-19 spread","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Different levels of risk depending on the type of activity individual practice, group activities, competitions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Involvement of non-essential guests during competitions or training sessions increases the risk","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prohibition of co-location of more than four people in fitness centers","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complete shutdown of public sports facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Revised and amended regulation targeting indoor and outdoor sports facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of partial and full lockdowns on physical and mental health","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health crisis requiring better exchange of information on the mitigation of risks and national reporting of infection situation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promoting the value of physical activities to overcome the consequences on citizens’ well-being in times of COVID-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Informal and formal interactions among occupants in health club facilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of staff training and supervision for precautionary measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fear of shared spaces and lack of confidence among members","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spacing the equipment at condensed arrangements may not effectively limit physical proximity, leading to increased risk of contagion.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and lack of UV light sterilization may result in the persistence of disease-causing agents in the indoor environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of digital monitoring and management systems may hinder the effective implementation of preventive measures and tracking of facility performance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High human traffic and social interactions increase the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited ventilation in waiting areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shared amenities in the break lounge","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overcrowding due to reservation system limitations","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proximity of lockers, toilets, and change booths may increase the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close proximity of individuals in the swimming pool and jacuzzi areas may lead to the spread of contagions.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in the indoor running track area may lead to stagnant air and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation due to limited window openings, increasing the risk of airborne disease spread","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of injuries from accidental falls due to uneven walls and varying voids along the track","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for surface contamination on the track flooring leading to the spread of infections","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Condensed arrangement of equipment may increase the risk of close contact and the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposed and painted black air ducts may contribute to the spread of airborne contaminants and pathogens within the hall.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close proximity of individuals and shared equipment increases the risk of fomite transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation due to fixed windows and limited airflow control","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective occupancy management and monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
